#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int N, U, cnt[222][100001], ans[100001];

main()
{
    scanf("%d %d", &N, &U);
    for (int a, b; U--; )
    {
        scanf("%d %d", &a, &b);
        if (a >= 222)
            for (int i = b; i <= N; i += a) ans[i]++;
        else cnt[a][b]++;
    }

    for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++)
        for (int j = 1; j < 222; j++)
        {
            ans[i] += cnt[j][i];
            if (i + j <= N)
                cnt[j][j+i] += cnt[j][i];
        }

    for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++)
        printf("%d ", ans[i]);
}
